error-handler-plugin:on-error.doc:name: Interpret Error
error-handler-plugin:on-error.badRequestError: #["There was an issue with your request message. Error is: " ++ vars.errorPayload default ""]
error-handler-plugin:on-error.unauthorizedError: #["You have issues accessing the system " ++ vars.errorPayload default ""]
error-handler-plugin:on-error.notFoundError: #["The API has not been implemented " ++ vars.errorPayload default ""]
error-handler-plugin:on-error.notAcceptableError: #["One of the request or parameters is unacceptable " ++ vars.errorPayload default ""]
error-handler-plugin:on-error.timeoutError: #["You request to the server has been timed-out " ++ vars.errorPayload default ""]
error-handler-plugin:on-error.tooManyRequestsError: #["You have made too many requests to the server " ++ vars.errorPayload default ""]
error-handler-plugin:on-error.serverError: #["There is a server issue " ++ vars.errorPayload default ""]
error-handler-plugin:on-error.methodNotAllowedError: #["The method has not been implemented " ++ vars.errorPayload default ""]
error-handler-plugin:on-error.connectivityError: #["You have issues accessing the system " ++ vars.errorPayload default ""]
